name: Srinivas U

GitHub repository management and best practices for Oracle Analytics Cloud

Master Data Management and Data Quality using Informatica MDM and IDQ

Oracle WebLogic Server installation, configuration, and administration
Power BI certification and expertise in Microsoft Office Suite advanced features
Python and R programming for data manipulation and machine learning

Shell scripting and UNIX/Linux environment proficiency

responsibility_sentences: Configured and managed Oracle WebLogic Server for OBIEE, OAS, and OAC in Windows and Linux clusters
Created dashboards and reports for multiple business domains including HR, Finance, Student Affairs, and Procurement
Designed and administered Oracle Utilities Analytics architecture and environment
Developed and maintained ETL processes using Oracle Data Integrator and other ETL tools
Developed complex PL/SQL code including stored procedures, functions, triggers, and packages for automation
Implemented security using LDAP and session cookie methods for Oracle BI solutions
Integrated 28+ data sources into a Data Lake using Informatica BDM and Cloudera platform
Managed Customer Data Platform integration and optimized real-time data activation with AI/ML capabilities
Scheduled and automated report generation and distribution using BI Publisher and SMTP mail servers
Upgraded and migrated OBIEE platforms from 10g/11g to 12c, Oracle Analytics Server, and Oracle Analytics Cloud
